duties_responsibilities.duty: Managing a book of business and handling new and renewal insurance business
Reviewing insurance contracts for accuracy and preparing certificates, proposals, policy summaries, and reviews
Applying problem-solving techniques to various issues including cancellations, claims, renewal issues, audits, receivables, and carrier issues
Supporting sales and driving agency revenue by working independently or as part of a team
Contributing to the retention of all assigned accounts and resolving various client issues

education_certification.credential: Active P&C License is required, prior experience in a brokerage setting is preferred
